name: Pizza Delivery Demastered Deluxe
description:
A pizz-tastic classic with plenty more juice! What started as a 3-day school game and then became a 7-day PICO-8 game, now better! Play as Stanley, a very definetly-not-from-petscop character that has to deliver a pizza. This is my attempt at not only making a better version of Pizza Delivery Demastered, but to also port it to a different fantasy console, the TIC-80 system. The controls:

Z - Runs

X - Jumps

Arrows - Moves the player

Return - Pauses the game

The level editor!

This is also my first attempt at a nice and easy-to-use level editor, the following controls apply to the editor mode available from the title screen:

- Number keys from 0 through 9 pick an object to place, B picks bushes

- Left mouse click places objects and the right one deletes

- Press P during editing mode to play the level and Enter to return to editor mode

-S saves the maps and E returns to the title while also saving

Credits and thanks

Uh, Me - Most of the work, porting the code, rewriting, doing music, graphics, etc

Jefftastic - Not only the creator of Pizza Delivery, but also the person behind Pizza Delivery Classic, from which I took plenty ideas, also gave a lot of other ideas and feedback, go check him out

Sinclair & The 1-Up Guy: You two gave me lot of feedback on the new additions and also helped with the new levels, thanks fellas

Inky - He started doing work on Pizza Delivery Remastered which inspired me to do this

The playtesting team - You guys helped this game to not-suck again, thank you all ♥

An apologize

This started as an exercise to learn how to use TIC-80, which may explain why some things may feel unpolished or buggy, it slowly became a pretty boring and exhausting project, so it's better if I just release it, I added too much stuff for me to keep in balance.
